title: Electrospun Cu–Co ferrite nanofibers: synthesis, structure, optical and magnetic properties, and anti-cancer activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7540-7550
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08087K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Fatimah Alahmari, Firdos Alam Khan, H. Sozeri, M. Sertkol, Mariusz Jaremko
In this study, we investigated Cu–Co ferrite nanofibers (NFs) that were synthesized for the first time employing the electrospinning technique.
